title: Disodium EDTA (Disodium Edetate)
overview: Disodium EDTA is a white, crystalline powder. It's the disodium salt of ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid (EDTA), a powerful chelating agent. Chelating agents form strong complexes with metal ions.
features: Exceptional Chelating Agent: Binds strongly to various metal ions, including calcium, magnesium, iron, and copper
Water Soluble: Dissolves readily in water for convenient use
Sequestering Ability: Prevents metal ions from participating in unwanted reactions, improving product stability

applications.title: Pharmaceutical
applications.description: Prevents degradation of active ingredients caused by trace metals, enhances the efficacy of preservatives, and used in chelation therapy to remove heavy metals from the body

applications.title: Cosmetics & Personal Care
applications.description: Stabilizer and preservative in shampoos, soaps, lotions, and other products. Prevents discoloration and rancidity caused by metal contamination

applications.title: Food
applications.description: Preservative to maintain color, flavor, and texture in canned foods, dressings, and sauces. Helps prevent oxidation and spoilage

applications.title: Industrial
applications.description: Used in cleaning solutions to remove metal deposits and scale, textile and paper processing to prevent metal contamination, and water treatment to soften water and control scaling
